name: Hippopond Defense
description:
You must defend against the waves of company drones with the help of your forest pals!

During the build phase, place towers. They can't go on trees or on roads. Then click the Orange button at the bottom right to start combat.

During combat, you can move with WASD. Going near your Booch pond will give you a bottle that you can use to refill your towers with SPACE. If the towers run out, they stop attacking.

For now there are only 3 waves and 1 level since I ran out of time.
